review_data.title: Sehr geiles Pub
review_data.content: Super Pub mit sehr Freundlichem Personal!! Läuft immer Sport und hat auch teilweise Live Bands. Immer 1 Bier wert!

review_data.title: Esperienza Terribile
review_data.content: Locale assolutamente da evitare. Servizio Pessimo, Qualità del cibo scadente e la birra aveva un retrogusto di lessiva per i...More

review_data.title: Für Fussball ist dieses Pub nichts wert
review_data.content: Bis anfangs Sommer 2019 war dieses Pub das beste im Bereich Fussball, leider ist es nicht merhr so seit einige...More

review_data.title: On way to theatre
review_data.content: Made a nice stop of on the way to the theatre. Beer & Cider was good. Fish & chips were ok poor waitress was horrified at the request of vinegar which i expect in any pub.But all in all a pleasant evening.

review_data.title: The best pub in Oerlikon!
review_data.content: The best pub in Oerlikon! Good place best service! Nice music! My first but not the last time! Cheers!

review_data.title: Neue Besitzer
review_data.content: Seit der Besitzer gewechselt hat kann man das Pub nicht mehr gebrauchen zum Glück ist noch der Vorbesitzer am arbeiten...More

review_data.title: Just Drink! forget the finger food...
review_data.content: A few drinks at Coopers..... Coopers is compact and a little drab, toilets are down stairs almost behind the counter. The beer was served promptly with little interaction.The Guinness was fine and reasonably priced so no complaints there. We ordered a platter for three which...More

review_data.title: Super pub
review_data.content: Super Pub, gute Stimmung - tolle Musik, gerne wieder. Preise für Zürich normal, Personal super freundlich, viel internationalen Publikum. Ausgezeichnetes...More

review_data.title: Horrible experience
review_data.content: I have been couple of months back to this place. The waiter was extremely arrogant and impolite. I waited ages for him to pay and he never came then I went to the bar to pay and he pushed me from my shoulder telling me...More

review_data.title: Einfach win Pub
review_data.content: Perfekt für ein Bier und Fusball schauen! Für uns wurde sogar der gewünschte Spiel an gemacht. TOP!!!

review_data.title: A good place for beer and match
review_data.content: Good cold beers, reasonable prices. Good place where you can watch football matches. I didn't eat there but I saw quite large portions of food. You can reserve places.

review_data.title: Good comfy place to meet friends
review_data.content: Good place with good burgers and beer. Nothing special, but it was anyway full. They have some interesting beers to try.

review_data.title: Good choice
review_data.content: It's a normal pub, nothing special, but in friendly atmosphere. The food was good and the beer cold. I think it is less expensive than other pubs (not cheap), so good quality price/ratio. I went there with my family (two children) and the service was...More

review_data.title: Pub zum Sport schauen ⚽️
review_data.content: + traditionell irisches Pub + gute Getränkeauswahl + Fußballschauen möglich - Getränke (für deutsche Verhältnisse) teuer - etwas ungemütliche Stühle

review_data.title: Sehr schönes Pub
review_data.content: Jedesmal wird man freundlich begrüsst. Es hat gutes Essen hier und auch das Bier schmeckt. Gemütliche Athmosphäre. Mehr braucht man...More

review_data.title: Shamrock
review_data.content: Irish Pub mit gemütlicher Atmosphäre und guter Bierauswahl. Ist auch super für einen feinen Apero oder Burger.

review_data.title: Ambiance, guets Bier und echte Iren
review_data.content: Tolle Gastgeber, ausgewogene Karte, echtes Kilkenny-Bier und Guinness so lange der Durst reicht... Definitiv einen Abstecher wert!

review_data.title: Luck of the Irish!
review_data.content: Popped in here a few times after work during our stay at Theatre 11. Vibey and friendly bar always with a good buzz. Good selection of local and international beers and at a reasonable price. Eclectic food menu too! Have the cheese toasty for a...More

review_data.title: Used to be my local!
review_data.content: Used to be my local after work every Friday evening. A great friendly atmosphere, excellent friendly service and a warm genuine welcome. The food as also excellent if you need a bit to eat and when they have live music it's generally a good standard...More

review_data.title: Bien
review_data.content: Un pub normal en Zurich, con variedad de cervezas y opciones de comidas rapidas como hamburguesas. No es barato ni...More

review_data.title: A respectable pub
review_data.content: No self-respecting pub in the world rates better than average. While the beer should be cold, the food good, and the staff professional to really excel in any of those areas departs from the realm of what a pub is. A public house. Cooper's like...More

review_data.title: Go somewhere else...
review_data.content: It was over 34 degrees so we decided to have a few drinks with some welcome air con. Well think again as this place does not have ac and the prices of the drinks are even more than much better bars in Zurich. It also...More

review_data.title: Alright pub grub
review_data.content: The Cooper's Pub is an alright place to grab a "pint" and get so comfort pub style food. Would not put it on must visit place but if your in the neighborhood stop by.

review_data.title: ok place
review_data.content: Nice enough establishment but the staff are not very friendly. and can be very expensive for drinks.

review_data.title: Nice Irish Pub, considering it's in Switzerland.
review_data.content: Nicely done interior, felt like an Irish Pub in the U.S. Staff were friendly & helpful. Beef & Guinness Pie was good. Music needs to be changed, as it was unpleasant the hole time: not Irish, either young or old.

review_data.title: Love this pub.
review_data.content: I think this pub is one of the best ones in Zurich. It is not a big place (maybe 80 max?) but the place is very cozy and looks really authentic. I spoke with the owner and he said the interior and furniture all comes...More

review_data.title: Willkommene Abwechslung
review_data.content: Gemütliches kleines Pub mit nettem Ein-Mann-Service. Willkommene Abwechslung im spießigen Einerlei drumrum. Preise sind faur&angemessen! Essen wesentlich besser (Burger) als...More

review_data.title: Favourite pub in Oerlikon
review_data.content: Go there everytime before I'am at a concert at Hallenstadion. Good selection of beers, tasty and reasonable priced pubfood (I recommend the snack platter). Staff is nice. Pub you need to know despite the location is a bit far from the interesting spots.

review_data.title: Good food and laid back atmosphere during lunch
review_data.content: Located in Oerlikon about a 2 minute walk from Oerlikon Bahnhof. This Irish Pub has dark wood interior and is relatively quiet during the lunch hours. I ordered a large Heineken Xtra-Cold (CHF 8.70) and I can say this was the coldest beer I have...More
